title: Jobless Claims Fell Last Week Amid Tight Labor Market
sub_head: Initial jobless claims, a proxy for layoffs, decreased to 180,000 last week
body:
New applications for U.S. unemployment benefits fell slightly last week as employers held on to their workers in a tight labor market.
Initial jobless claims, a proxy for layoffs, decreased to 180,000 last week from the previous weekâ€™s revised level, the Labor Department said Thursday.
